document_data.name: Guard officer
document_data.mainbody: A high-ranking member of the [[Guard (Tantras)|Guard]] of the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]] was an '''officer'''.
document_data.Possessions: Officers of the Guard were outfitted in blue oiled [[plate mail]] armor emblazoned with the coat of arms of Tantras: three silver stars over a silver breaking wave on a field of royal blue, called the "blue and silver". They wielded maces, [[morningstar]]s, or short swords.
document_data.Activities: Officers commanded multiple units and sections of the city, such as the harbor.
